channel.title: Alice Stears Research
channel.description: Recent content on Alice Stears Research

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a PhD candidate in Ecology at the University of Wyoming in the Program in Ecology and the Botany Department. I am a plant ecologist excited about all sorts of plant and ecological questions, but am particularly interested the impact of global change on ecological processes in plant populations and communities. I use functional traits as tools to understand the mechanisms underlying plant responses to the environment, as well as to make predictions and draw conclusions about plant responses that are generalizable across taxanomic groups.

item.title: Fun
item.description: When I’m not doing science, I’m likely doing one of the following: hanging out with my dog skiing in the backcountry as much as possible mountain biking being outside eating and cooking food knitting, sewing, or making other things by hand

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
